amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Children and Families Services Programs by $100 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 457 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Children and Families Services Program, and the Community Service Block Grant, each, by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 316 (Roll no. 72).
